function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity to other balconies and shared outdoor spaces can increase the risk of disease transmission between residents.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease spread within the apartment housing, leading to potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Reconfigure outdoor spaces to promote physical distancing and implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols.","Technologies":"Surveillance systems to monitor and enforce physical distancing, UV-C disinfection systems for outdoor areas.","People":"Residents of the apartment housing and visitors.","Owner":"Property management and local health authorities."},{"Description":"Limited control over indoor air quality and thermal comfort in small dwellings may lead to poor ventilation and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to airborne diseases and reduced overall occupant health and well-being.","Mitigation":"Install ventilation systems with high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters and air purification technologies. Provide guidelines for proper ventilation and temperature control.","Technologies":"HEPA filtration systems, air purifiers, smart HVAC systems with remote control features.","People":"Residents of the apartment housing.","Owner":"Property management and building developers."},{"Description":"Crowded shared spaces such as lobbies, elevators, and laundry rooms can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases among residents.","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks, leading to compromised public health within the apartment housing.","Mitigation":"Implement capacity limits, promote mask-wearing, and enhance ventilation in enclosed shared spaces. Utilize touchless technologies for entry and exit points.","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, touchless access control systems, UV-C disinfection for high-touch surfaces.","People":"Residents of the apartment housing, building staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Property management and building maintenance staff."}]}
